input.sentences: this was the band first public performance .
they were a little nervous but the tried not to let the crowd see .
they opened up with a song full of heavy guitar rifts .
as the started to get into the music they completed forgot about the crowd .
it was a great first show | but they were very tired afterwards .
output.sentences: James gave his first performance on stage last night.
The crowd was really into his song, which made him feel enthusiastic and lift his arms.
The second guitarist really ripped during the solo.
By the third song all the nervous anticipation had gone and everyone was riding the wave of the music.
Afterwards, all of the musicians, including James, were very spent and totally tired.
